General.Name: Poulaillon SA
General.Description: Poulaillon SA manufactures and sells frozen bakery and pastry goods in France. The company provides breads, pastries, sandwiches, moricettes, sweets, desserts, cakes, etc. It also offers catering services. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Wittelsheim, France.

2.Name: Mrs. Magali  Poulaillon
2.Title: Deputy Chief Exec. Officer and Director
